page.title: 12LIFE STYLE - TRAVEL & FAMILY
page.content:
72% of families in our survey claimed to go away from home for relaxation. Apart from walking from home, other activities required the means of transport appropriate, be it car, bicycle or bus.
Some of our families enjoyed swimming, some visiting places of interest, others enjoyed riding, music lessons, attending church or Sunday School, visiting relatives, shopping, and attending Brownies.
Possibly because of the expense of travel, comparatively few families managed to go away from their homes to relax each week. Most families managed at least once a month away, and some only very irregularly.
